summary: AN ORDINANCE related to land use and zoning amending Sections 23.49.008, 23.49.015, and 23.86.006 of the Seattle Municipal Code; allowing an increase in building height in portions of the Downtown Mixed Commercial 340/290-400 zone on certain conditions; and making technical revisions.
vote: 6-0 (Absent: McIver; Disqualified from Voting: Godden, Rasmussen)
